text.div:
Generated Narrative: SearchParameter ror-sp-organization-price-amount-value

RORSPOrganizationPriceAmountValue

Paramètre amount-value:number

Paramètre de recherche sur la valeur du tarif des prestations et services

RessourceOrganization
ExpressionOrganization.extension.where(url='https://interop.esante.gouv.fr/ig/fhir/ror/StructureDefinition/ror-organization-price').extension.where(url='amount').value.as(Money).value
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: RORSPOrganizationPriceAmountValue
description: Paramètre de recherche sur la valeur du tarif des prestations et services
